Meet Professional Executive Leadership Coach Azmina Mulji

Qualifications, Credentials & Memberships

  • Global Diploma in Professional Coaching

  • MBA in HR Management (Heriot-Watt University UK)

  • Bachelors of Laws (UON Kenya)

  • Accredited Corporate Governance Auditor

  • Advocate of the High Court of Kenya

  • Member International Coaching Federation

  • Member Institute of Human Resource Management of Kenya

  • Member of the Law Soceity of Kenya

  • Member of the Institute of the Company Secretaries of Kenya

About

  • Human ability and potential have always intrigued Azmina having worked in leadership positions spanning over twenty years in various industries. Her interest in people development led her from being a corporate lawyer into the Human Resources and Coaching professions, which she is deeply passionate about. “Everyone has 100% potential for success, waiting to be discovered” is her personal mantra as she engages with her clients as a Professional Coach. Up until August 2020, she led the people’s agenda in a fast growing commercial bank in Kenya, developing, coaching and mentoring employees and teams across the institution which resulted in unprecedented motivation (happiness) and performance levels leading to exceptional increased stakeholder value. A win-win situation for all. She is enthralled about the power of coaching individuals for personal and/or professional transformation and corporate teams for performance par excellence. Passionate about inspiring others, Azmina has helped clients break through perceived obstacles that hold back success and fulfilment. She has coached clients in Kenya and beyond including Hong Kong, Japan, France and India. He exceptional coaching skills and positive energies have resulted in unprecedented professional and personal growth and transformation for her clients. She has helped numerous clients re-discover themselves, evoking inner awareness and empowering them to take actions for transformation, boosting their strengths, abilities and potential increasing levels of self-reliance, self-confidence, self-esteem for personal and professional success.

Positive Intelligence Empowerment Coaching Program

From Self-Sabotage to Self-Mastery
Build knowledge, tools and process for lifetime growth

  • A program like no other. An evidence-based model rooted in neuroscience and brain development. A six week program that leverages on technology to help strength brain power and build intelligence that is positive for greater impact, higher success, stronger relations and happier self. Radically simplified the program is set to heal the root cause of all unhappy and negative emotions fear, stress, anger, guilt, shame, insecurity, and the like which control us through our inner saboteurs in 3 simple steps

  • 1. Intercepting the saboteur which reacts with negative emotions

  • 2. Boosting your ability to command your mind to quieten the saboteur

  • 3. move to your sage area, where the clear calm focused mind can respond to challenges and events with positive emotions

  • The PQ program is supported by an app available on android and IOS. Its not just the normal kind of coaching but trains you and gives you tools that you can apply in all personal, professional and functional areas as shown below.

  • Personal

    Professional

    Functions

    Stress

    Conflict Management

    (Example: Sales)
    Closing
    Prospecting
    Client Presentations
    Resilience

    Welness

    Creativity

    Diet

    Productivity

    Parenting

    Leadership

    Relationships

    Time Management

    Career Planning

    Coaching

  • The PQ program is six (6) weeks in duration and which includes

    • Two free assessments at the beginning and end each

    • Access to the coaching app (Android/iOS) for a whole year

    • Mental Fitness tools

    • 1-hour weekly video (on weekend or Monday)

    • 15 minutes/day of practice (5 3minute each exercises)

    • 8 chapters of Positive Intelligence audio book

    • Real time progress metrics

    • Membership to the PQ global community

    • Six weekly group coaching with me as your coach

Executive Coaching for Professional Women

Create the work life you aspire to.

  • Empowering and inspiring women helping them develop authentic strategies, confident personal brands enabling them lead at higher levels and thrive in their careers with ease and flow

  • Work/life balance, no me-time, imposter syndrome and frustrations are common for women achievers. Coaching will help you overcome all these for greater fulfillment, joy, and success

Career Coaching

Find greater fulfillment in your career

  • Frustrated, bored or unfulfilled at work? Feeling “stuck” career-wise with no idea how to move forward? Want to make a career change, but don’t know how or what? Seeking to know yourself better and the direction your career should take? Looking for career progression i.e. promotion, leadership or earning more money?

  • Look no further. We got you covered. Engage with us for a more rewarding successful career today. We help our clients understand their current status, revamping resumes, building a personal brand statement, living the brand, interview presentation skills and leadership skills development within the workspace

About Us 📕

The Happy People Space has been created with a vision to make the world a happier place by partnering with organizations and individuals to help them fulfill their purpose, promoting their happiness and success. We provide bespoke HR consultancy and executive coaching services with transformational results validated by our clients. We promise to deliver services with authenticity, excellence, and value beyond expectations at pocket-friendly prices.
